deskripsi: Rich, full-bodied espresso in steamed milk, lightly topped with foam. A caffe latte is simply a shot or two of bold espresso with fresh, sweet steamed milk over it.
Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a deep layer of foam.
Espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, topped with sweetened whipped cream.
Espresso combined with vanilla-flavored syrup, milk, and caramel drizzle for a sweet treat.
Cold brew coffee topped with house-made vanilla sweet cream for a smooth, creamy finish.
